website_summaries.verdict: All the quality of classic PUGG goals in a smaller size perfect for preschool and younger elementary players.
pros: Set of two goals, pegs, spare parts kit, and carrying bag
Sets up easily with a quick twist
cons: Not big enough for teens and adults

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit With The Kids; And Great For Practice
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to help my boys practice their skills outside of formal practice. The found them easy to set up, and a little bit of a challenge to collapse and store them. Beyond just practicing, they have become a huge hit with the neighborhood kids who come over when they see these set up in the yard. Pickup games have been the staple of summer! I find these easy to fold up. Fit in any trunk so great to take to the park or beach.
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, well-made goals that are super portable!
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo son wanted a set of goals he could use to practice his soccer shots. We don't have a lot of extra room for traditional goals, so I was looking for something that would fold up and store easily. These are PERFECT! Took all of two minutes to assemble and seem to be made of high-quality and durable materials. They are perfect for our needs, but are quite a bit smaller than traditional goals - just makes him work harder to aim! :-)
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Short-Sided Pickup Games
customer_reviews.text: Received these 4' goals yesterday and put them right to use in our weekly practice/scrimmage. No need to stake them down unless you play extremely high-scoring games and get tired of realignment. I think by not securing them with stakes it will prolong the life of these seemingly well made pop-up goals. They "twist to close" easily enough and slide nicely into a convenient carry pouch that will fit into just about any small car trunk/boot, I would imagine. I'm happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: Three Chord Monte

customer_reviews.title: Three year old fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three year old grandson's birthday. It was a little pricey but very worth it due to the durability. I'm tired of spending a little less and then having the product break after a short time. This is an investment for him and future kids in the family to enjoy in the backyard! Even the dad and uncle had fun!
customer_reviews.author: K Ren

customer_reviews.title: Could use better stakes, but goals are great
customer_reviews.text: My pickup soccer group has used Pugg goals for many years now, there's nothing even close. I do wish the plastic stakes were a little sturdier. They sometimes snap in half when you're trying to clamp down on harder soil. But they do come with replacements so there's that. The goals themselves last forever, they still look as good as new. They are super light to transport and very easy to fold once you get the hang of it. They fold into themselves like those collapsible windshield covers
customer_reviews.author: Eloy

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets, and there were two goals per carrying bag as indicated. These are a few dollars more than I wanted to spend, but they have a warranty, and the last brand of goals I purchased broke on the first day we used them (U12 girls). I have always had trouble folding up Pugg goals, but after I actually read the instructions, it's quite simple. I am very satisfied with this purchase and product.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBiRDs

customer_reviews.title: CHOOSE PUGG! YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Can you say durable? Thats what comes to mind when I think of PUGG. I was hesitant about spending the extra money to get these over the cheaper brands but I am completely satisifed! These nets are tough! The material stands out! Easy easy easy to set up and take down... less thsn 5 seconds per net guaranteed! Sometimes when we take to the fields for practice and all the fields are taken up I immediately set up in a sace large enough for a small practice and cone off.. I pop these nets up and were all set! Practice will never have to be canceled again due to no fields/goals available! Shipping was excellent. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J M

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, highly durable, quality product
customer_reviews.text: PUGG pop up goals are the best. If you dont know, now you do. I've been using the 6 footers for 15 years....still going strong. I picked up the 4 footers for additional and different training. Get a set of these or the 6 footers. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Zute W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two year old grandson who loves to run and kick the soccer ball. Will use these goals to give him an area to aim for. These goals are very popular with school districts for training. I worked for an athletic equipment company and we sold many many of these goals on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: jn0277

customer_reviews.title: Double check you got the right one.
customer_reviews.text: First fulfillment gave me the 1 net set, so watch it especially if not opened for a few months (Christmas)? Return went easily, and my wife can easily fold these for the kids. Went with these as this is the brand the local soccer camps use.
customer_reviews.author: Martin K

customer_reviews.title: It’s not 4ft tall (much shorter)
customer_reviews.text: I only given it 3 stars instead of 5 stars as the image showed it 4ft tall and it actually is 4 ft wide a not 4 ft 30 tall so it’s too small for my 42inche kid. Very disappointed in the bad marketing but the Nets themselves are easy to fold and secure easy and sturdy with the pegs which i have it 5 stars in all other categories.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: nice size for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: lake it can fold flat and be stored in the bag that comes with to Size perfect for 4 year old, can use as a soccer net or put both together , Drapers a blanket and instant tent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We use these for my son's U13 soccer team when we don't have goals available on the practice field, or when we are working on increasing goal shot accuracy. They pack and carry easily in the included 25" x 35" x 1" carrying case. The included plastic stake-down pegs are helpful, are attached with elastic straps so they don't get lost, and tuck easily into adjoining pockets in the blue edging. The goals also came with a few extra pegs, which is helpful if one gets accidentally kicked and damaged during play.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Soccer coaches love these
customer_reviews.text: I am a soccer coach and love to use goals for almost every drill that we do. These pugs are great for giving kids a target to finish on. If you are going to coach soccer, these are something you will want to get a set of. It literally takes a couple seconds to flip these out and pin them down. Putting them away is quick to once you understand how to fold them up. They store away very nicely as well less than and inch thick stored probably.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin J Elcano

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, takes short minute to learn to fold
customer_reviews.text: Folding takes a quick learn but other than that these goals are perfect! We got them for our two daughters who love to play in the backyard and they are perfect for that and then to pack them with us for a trip to the park or somewhere with more kids. Great buy and definitely worth the money since they are so durable and portable!
customer_reviews.author: Twila

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2016 for my backyard so kids could practice and still standing strong. These are very well made and it’s super easy to setup or take down. Carrying case is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: diazc619

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pop-Up Goals
customer_reviews.text: Great pop-up goals. Have used on beach, in yards & in basement. Kids can pop-up and fold back. Bags are durable, as are goals. Very portable, collapses into thin bag. On windy days, the stakes that come with the goals work perfectly. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lbwr

customer_reviews.title: Puggs are great
customer_reviews.text: These get lots of use in team practice. Easy to set up, no broken stakes yet. These are great for practicing precision passing and are lighter than the 6 foot version.
customer_reviews.author: Blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy learning tool for soccer.
customer_reviews.text: This setup is great and takes a few seconds to setup. A great learning tool for any youngster getting into soccer ! It is an all around great product.
customer_reviews.author: WindyCityDan

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day. It was easy to set up and it looks high quality. The bag was bigger than I expected but still very usable and easy to carry. My kids love playing soccer with Daddy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Goals not used; storage bag arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: These arrived yesterday and and the goals were not looked at or used. I decided to return them because the storage bag arrived damaged (shipped without packaging) and I'm giving the set as a gift so want it to be in new condition. A small area at the top of the bag is coming loose from the zipper and there are 5 black felt tip marker ink marks on the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Resident

customer_reviews.title: Soccer-Corona Training
customer_reviews.text: Best quality, so will get lots of use after the virus is gone as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Polutta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Soccer Goals
customer_reviews.text: My kids desperately wanted goals to kid soccer balls into and I didn't want something permanent to move around the lawn when it's mowing time and these goals make us both happy. They are VERY EASY to set-up and take down and the fact that they store so nicely (and flat) in the storage bag is a huge plus. The goals are sturdy and well built, they don't feel flimsy by any stretch. So far they've been totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope D.

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy portable goal
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find both a sturdy and portable goal but this one works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: we purchased a less expensive franklin sports one prior and that one was awful. this one is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: christine abella

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We use them indoor at home. They hold up well. We fall on top of them and they are very durable. Putting them in the carrying case is a pain though.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy spender

customer_reviews.title: Great goal!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, purchase these for our club and are looking at getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Pick-up!!!
customer_reviews.text: These goals are perfect for pick-up soccer. Nobody wants to play goalie? No problem! They are really a great product, and i would rather pay this price than get something cheap that breaks. They have stakes connected to elastic straps, which is a great solution so they don't move, but also don't break. They stop the ball every time, and trap it in the net, very satisfying when you score a goal. It is also easy to get the ball out, because the rod is flexible. Really, this is an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan (Pennsylvania)

customer_reviews.title: Total workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with the 7-year-old. The local soccer league uses a larger version, and these see a lot of action and hold up really well. The other day a FedEx truck ran over a net that had been on the side of the street, and it had to be extricated from the wheel well but it popped right back up, no damage to the frame. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret G Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly couldn't have imagined going with another brand. Tried and true with this one... has a lot to do with the way the net it, it lies loose as opposed to how tot other brands are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard for portable soccer goals
customer_reviews.text: These pop-up soccer goals are simply the best. They're regularly used by premier coaches. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Digimon

customer_reviews.title: These are Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: WOW ! I could not be more pleased, these were ordered for my 3 yr old son who loves soccer. They are super easy to assemble and easy to transport, we use them both inside and out! They are very durable as there have been time when my son thinks he is in a big game and jumps into the net to catch the ball!! I cant wait to use them in this upcoming soccer season for practice.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have for coaches and have held up really well over 3 seasons so far.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for coaches and have held up really well over 3 seasons so far.
customer_reviews.author: W33P

customer_reviews.title: Just easy to you
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids set up and play against each other. Easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Barry J. Evans, MD

customer_reviews.title: Little soccer player
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to carry from place to place. Perfect size for a little soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Helwig

customer_reviews.title: Working well after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I've used these less than 10 times so far. But they are working well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Easily fits in the trunk of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Easily fits in the trunk of my Honda Civic. It's a better size for encouraging accuracy than the traditional yellow Pugg goals.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Took a minute to figure out how to fold but then all good. Easy to carry and store.
customer_reviews.author: Vita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Works great! My sons have had a blast practicing soccer with these.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: They fit nicely into its zippered case
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goals 4 years ago. My son uses them all the time and they have been used for multiple soccer teams and soccer practices. They have held up very well. They fit nicely into its zippered case. These are so convenient to just throw in the car and use at the park or at the beach. We love these. Great buy, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my grandson's birthday. He loves it! So compact and easy to assemble too!
customer_reviews.author: Deb K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy open/close
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kiddos play soccer (6,4) and the goals are lightweight, easy to open, close and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna O.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Tool for Soccer Coaches
customer_reviews.text: These are real useful for soccer practices. I have two sets of the 4 footers and one set of the 6 footers. There are some little plastic pieces that break or move out of place and then the net will sometimes have a hard time standing up. The nets could use a slight redesign to eliminate that problem. I do recommend these nets to soccer coaches, however.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Love these goals.
customer_reviews.text: Our four and six year olds started playing soccer this year. The goals were easy to set up and take down and our kids enjoy practicing in the backyard. Came with two (2) goals, carrying bag and stakes that attach directly to the goals. Very convenient set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money, so far only played with twice...so hot out!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Horsfield

customer_reviews.title: Love this product-easy to use and store!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, set up, and take down! Durable and lightweight! Our family loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Z

customer_reviews.title: A Score for Soccer
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. The are great for the basement and taking them to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent back yard goal
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and easy to set up and take down. Build seems good but time will tell. Perfect for young ones or practice drills. Not weighted therefore too light for rocket shots by strong kickers.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Our son just turned 4 and loves these and so do we. They are sturdy, I've tripped over them a couple of times while guarding and we've ran "through" them while playing. They fold up nicely and are great for throwing into the car for a trip to a new park. They are very compact and don't take up any real estate in the garage as we hang them on the wall in the garage. As long as they lat a couple of years, we will surely purchase a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: I'm just saying...

customer_reviews.title: Nice goals
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for us. My almost 5-yr-old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler & Kathy

customer_reviews.title: PUGG 4 Footer Portable Training Goal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of these for my 7 and 9 year old. I was thinking of getting a cheaper, no name set due to price but I'm so glad I bought these instead. They are very good quality, fold up easy with straps to hold them in place and a good carrying bag to hold both of them. Spend the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: Knuckles

customer_reviews.title: Must have for soccer coach
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product at a coach's certification clinic and it was used for small games. I use this for coaching my U10 team, but I could see this used for any age group. These are easy to put away, unlike other twist and fold nets and both goals fit easily in the bag. Each goal also has 3 attached spikes to keep the nets from being knocked away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coaching tool, flimsy bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made product! Comes with extra spikes, which is a bonus! Only reason not 5 stars is due to bag construction. Lots of stress on bag while putting nets back in due to spring coil, and zipper has separated on one bag. The 2 set is a great deal, and despite bag issue love the product, and great coaching tool.
customer_reviews.author: D. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and portable, you can stake it to the ground so it doesn't fall over if you kick the ball into it. Perfect for my kids who are around 4-6 years old. Fold and back into the bag is a snap. The bag isn't tight fitting so it's nice and easy. I purchased this because my kid's soccer coach uses it as well. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Cho

customer_reviews.title: Loved by future soccer players!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect size for toddlers before 12 years of age. Fold easily. Sets up quickly and is sturdy despite the abuse it gets when you play a serious game of soccer. The storage bank is welcomed when you need to go to the beach or park.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for my Niece
customer_reviews.text: As a long time soccer player, Pugg is known to be the best for pop up soccer goals, which is why I bought these for my niece for Christmas this year. I know she will be able to use these for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Score
customer_reviews.text: Great goal set. Grand kids love the 4'. Need to order a 6' for us big kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SOCCER GOALS FOR BEGINNERS
customer_reviews.text: If you like soccer and have young kids, these are a must buy. So well made and they fold up into a very thin and lightweight shoulder carried package. My kids have kicked hundred of full speed goals into them and they have help up with no rips or tears. These are the gold standard for ages 3-8. They are the same size and dimensions as the ones used by our AYSO league though age 6.
customer_reviews.author: Raina Dragonas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a coach
customer_reviews.text: Our club director had these and we ended up buying them. We keep them in the car and throw them out on field in seconds. They store flat and are easy to pop up and take down. Lightweight, and durable. I recommend them to other coaches - I'm a fill in coach for U6 and U10, as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: the 2 goal set is large enough for practices and small enough to take with. sturdy and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Atwood

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I use these for my U6 boys team. Once you figure out how to get them closed, which can be a challenge they are great. I would recommend these. 6' goals are used for AYSO at this age. But that was going to be too big for me to haul around. These are very durable. Don't buy anything but PUGG brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy set up, anchor system is attached to the net.....no parts to lose!!!! Fold away to nothing for storage!!!!! After I bought them I found out that my 18 year old daughters soccer trainer ALWAYS uses them.... if its good enough for them then these are good enough for my 4 year old!! I got the size up for my sons age and they are fine. I didn't want to have to buy new ones in 2 years and he is a little advanced athletically.....they have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Score!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect timing. We purchased these goals for our son's 4th birthday. Two weeks later we learned that my husband is his soccer coach for the fall season. Anyway, the goals will be great for soccer practice. They have been so much fun already. We regularly play soccer in the backyard and it so nice to have a real goal to aim for now. The kids have taken to kicking the ball in the goal over and over. And, they have also created a game where they put the goals together to make a 'cage' for their stuffed animals.....not the intended use, but a good use of the imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Goal!

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little soccer fan in your house
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our grandson's fourth birthday. He has just started to play soccer. The set comes in a nice bag, and the goals are easy to set up and take down, and withstand a good amount of abuse. I do not know what an "official" size soccer net is, but these are great fun for little kids in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love extra parts for future
customer_reviews.text: have used PUGG in the past and been very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chandler

customer_reviews.title: They can pull them in and out of garage easily by themselves and play and practice
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my twin 6 yr old nephews to play at home. Both just started soccer as an activity. We don't stake them. They can pull them in and out of garage easily by themselves and play and practice. I also bought cones for them. They loved this as a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Burslem

customer_reviews.title: Best Pop-up goals i have owned!
customer_reviews.text: These goals are completely worth the investment, great quality and durability. I might even buy the larger ones!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easily portable goals
customer_reviews.text: I love these goals. Easy setup, easy take-down, and my kids can plan soccer anywhere. The bag is great, keeps them contained and easily portable. Pretty sturdy for pop-ups. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you buy a larger size
customer_reviews.text: Well made and durable. However, I recommend you buy a larger size. This one is just a bit too small.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Hauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our boys' U9 soccer team and they are perfect for our needs. They are easy to set up and break down and it helps that the pins to anchor them down are attached so that they do not become lost. We have not had any issues with them and have been using them at practices for the past 2 months twice a week. The cost is far less than what we would have paid in store for quality that is just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Chantay L.

customer_reviews.title: Great practice goals!
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoors for the smaller kids, easy to unfold and set up by sticking the pegs into the ground then store again in the carry case after we are done. We even use them inside, of course cannot anchor the goal down like you can on the grass outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Soccer Practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of goals to use while coaching the 2 youth teams and they are a big help. Makes the kids work harder on accuracy . Once you get the hang of the twisting motion to fold them back up they are easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: O. Eric Norris

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We use these weekly and love them for a Saturday pickup game in the park with friends. We also use them for a little one verses one in the backyard from time to time. This makes it so easy to have a game.
customer_reviews.author: Gerg

customer_reviews.title: Love this and would purchase it again
customer_reviews.text: Very durable product and exactly what was advertised. Love this and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Sager

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of goal posts
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of goal posts. Easy to set up and fold. Stores in provided carrying case. Happy with the purchase. Will see how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Claudius Kerges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for pickup games
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these to use with my kids in the cul-de-sac. These things work great. They setup in a snap, are light enough for the kids to carry them, and fold up easily so they take little-to-no space in the garage to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Steinbok

customer_reviews.title: A must have for effective practices!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goals for practice. You can come up with a lot of games and drills that use the Pugg goals which will improve your skill or team's skills. The only thing that might be a little tough is pushing the attached stakes into hard ground. Also...don't be afraid to look at the instructions on how to fold them up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... reliable small goals to be used for training or fun with friends
customer_reviews.text: Most reliable small goals to be used for training or fun with friends. I had a pair of these before that lasted me for years. I still have them and work fine, but they now have some holes and the spikes to place them in the ground broke. Other than that they still stand up and can take shots
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Goals great but need better anchors.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the goals a lot. Easy to open and close and bag is convenient. However the anchor pegs are too fragile and also are too blunt to get into even moderately hard ground. If you can't get them in all the way then they snap off with little or no contact. Some replacements were provided, but we lost 3 in the first 2 weeks so not enough.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for all ages. I used them in high school and I just bought two for my kids. Easy, portable, durable.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Every serious soccer coach shock own a pair.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I work mainly with U-8 boys and under and these are ideal for small sided games and drills. Light weight, portable, and extremely durable. Worth every penny in my opinion and a piece of cake to set up. I love them so much that I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these soccer goals are easy to store. My kids love to play soccer, but goals made out of PVC are too big to store in our garage. The kids can easily set these up themselves, take them down and put them in the bag. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Portable soccer goals
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my grandson to practice with. Fold easily for storage and are not too large. The size allows them to be used outside, or inside when weather is bad. They seem to be well made and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ VA

customer_reviews.title: Great Goals
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. And these goals are well made and the quality shows. They come with a storage bag and extra plastic spikes in case the ones attached to the goal get lost. Easy to fold down and store, they lay flat to a thickness of 2"-3" in storage. Hope to have these around for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fresburg

customer_reviews.title: must have for active grandkids
customer_reviews.text: coached soccer for 20 years and now retired but i still have to have a set of goals for when the grand kids are around. sets up instantly and ready to roll, the storage is key in our limited space. kids expect it now when visiting:>)
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I kind of wish I had gone with ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I kind of wish I had gone with the 6 ft goals just so the kids have a little bigger of a target, but it's still nice to have some goals to shoot at. Quality seems to be really good.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Very portable goals that are very easy to set up and fold
customer_reviews.text: I use the product for free play with my young children. Glad I got this 4 foot goals instead of the 6 foot one. It is the right size for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: LuisSoto

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and storage bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great product. Very solid and good reputation. Love these items for my grade school events
customer_reviews.author: DasGoob

customer_reviews.title: so happy with this purchase : ))))
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price and a very easy assemble .You get two great quality goals.loved my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson. He loves it. What more can you say
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Amazon shipped promptly as always!
customer_reviews.text: The PUGG soccer goal set is perfect for our 7 year old grandson who is just beginning soccer.
customer_reviews.author: SHB

customer_reviews.title: Goal
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loved this. She is a soccer fanatic and at the very last asked for this from Santa. It arrived on time and was the highlight of a 10 year olds Christmas. Thanks Amazon for coming through in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, easy to take down. I don't use the steaks . . . but I used them as targets to shoot AWAY from with my teams (put one of these in goal for finishing drills, if they hit it, goal does not count.
customer_reviews.author: Indygreg

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great goal for our purposes - pickup games in the backyard or nearby park with a limited number of players. I agree that for larger games you might want to get the next size up, but we are playing up to 5 on 5 and these are great. Pack up easily, peg down easily - just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: qksilver

customer_reviews.title: Quality portable nets
customer_reviews.text: These nets are really well made and perfect for taking to the beach to play soccer. They come with stakes, so the won't blow away and the fact that they fit in the little bag is awesome. They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our soccer-loving family!
customer_reviews.text: We have some pretty intense front yard soccer games at our house, and these goals are perfect for training and small-sided games. We have used these goals many, many times and they have held up amazingly well. My sons' teams also use them for training and their coaches prefer them over competing brands. The best part about the goals (other than how well they've held up) is that they really are VERY easy to fold up and put away. My 6 and 8 year olds have no trouble doing it themselves. I highly, highly recommend these goals!
customer_reviews.author: LUMom

customer_reviews.title: The best product after Dyson vaccuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love these goals. I regret wasting my money on buy other cheaper so-called "MLS" goal and all the time that it took to put them together. These are sure worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great for back yard or to the park
customer_reviews.text: This goal set is great to be used in the back yard or taken to the park. It takes 2 minutes to put it back in the bag and it is pretty stable when you install it on the grass. My son likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Training and Backyard Soccer
customer_reviews.text: My U6 son's team uses the 6 foot version for their games and practice and they've held up super well. We bought these for the back yard and I was very impressed with the quality and ease of set-up and tear down. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the backyard soccer player
customer_reviews.text: We have two young soccer players and they love these goals. The neighborhood kids all love them too. Very easy to transport to a playing field for more practice. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

product_meta.title: PUGG 4 Foot Pop Up Soccer Goal - Portable Training Futsal Football Net - The Original Pickup Game Goal (Two Goals & Bag)
product_meta.description:
The 4 Foot PUGG Pop-Up Goal is designed for maximum portability and performance. Its intuitive twist-to-close design folds down to a 1” flat oval, allowing it to fit compactly in its carrying case. Weighing only 4lbs on your shoulder, a pair of PUGG goals are ready for you to take the game with you - wherever you play.

AMAZON.COM
Help your child or adolescent hone his or her soccer skills with this Pugg portable 4 Footer training goal boxed set, which includes two goals and a bag. Also available in 6- and 2.5-foot sizes, the Pugg 4 Footer is ideal for clinics, backyard contests, and even organized games at the park. Each 4 Footer goal is remarkably easy to set up: just hold on to the corners, and then twist the left corner counterclockwise while bringing the hands together. 



The 4 Footer goal sets up with a quick twist of the hands. In mere seconds, you'll have a fully functional soccer goal, with anchoring pegs to help adhere it to the ground. The goal collapses just as quickly into a flat oval that measures 1-inch thick, with a handy carrying bag for easy transport. As a result, you can vacate the practice field as soon as the weather turns, and without having to break down a cumbersome multi-piece goal system. Each 4 Footer measures 4 by 2.5 by 2.5 feet (W x H x D) when installed and is safe for both kids and adults. The set comes with two goals, one carrying bag, and anchoring pegs.
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL - The PUGG goal is the original pop-up-goal created in 1984.
INCLUDES - Set includes 2 goals, pegs, and carrying bag with strap.
QUICK EASY SETUP - Sets up easily with a quick twist; collapses into 1-inch-thick flat oval.
PORTABLE - Included carrying bag keeps goals contained as two dimensional frames.
ALL SURFACE - Integrated pegs provide stability for grass, sand, and turf surfaces.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
